alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 7:19PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Jefferson, northeastern Madison, southwestern Lowndes and southern Brooks Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 718 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of Quitman to 8 miles northwest of Blue Springs. Movement was southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Madison, Quitman, Greenville, Morven, Hopewell, Cherry Lake, Hamburg, Pinetta, Kinderlou, Lovett, Nankin, Empress, Clyattville, Brooks Co A/p, Blue Springs, Hanson and Ashville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
